两个正整数相除，商是$$6$$，余数是$$5$$，被除数、除数、商和余数的和是$: When two positive integers are divided, the quotient is $$6$$ and the remainder is $$5$$. The sum of the dividend, divisor, quotient, and remainder is $$233$$. What is the dividend, and what is the divisor?

How many fish did Xiao Ming catch?

How many parts were originally in pile A, and how many parts did Master Li produce in total that day?

公园里的猴子比猩猩多$$10$$只，猴子数量是猩猩的$$2$$倍，那么猴子有只．: There are $$10$$ more monkeys than gorillas in the park, and the number of monkeys is $$2$$ times that of gorillas. How many monkeys are there?
牛老师带着$$37$$名同学到野外春游．休息时，艾迪问：“牛老师您今年多少岁啦?: Teacher Niu took $$37$$ students on a spring outing. During the break, Eddie asked, "Teacher Niu, how old are you this year?" Teacher Niu amusingly replied, "If you multiply my age by $$2$$, subtract $$16$$, then divide by $$2$$, and add $$8$$, the result is exactly the total number of people participating in today's activity." Children, do you know how old Teacher Niu is this year?

It is known that the distance between their homes is $$2000$$ meters, and they met after $$10$$ minutes. Doctor walks $$90$$ meters per minute, how many meters does Da Kuan walk per minute?

The freight truck travels at $$56$$ kilometers per hour, and the passenger bus travels at $$74$$ kilometers per hour. If the freight truck and the passenger bus start from both locations at the same time and move towards each other, how many hours will it take for the two vehicles to be $$130$$ kilometers apart for the first time after they start?

The distance between locations $$A$$ and $$B$$ is $$780$$ kilometers. The truck travels at $$56$$ kilometers per hour, and the bus travels at $$74$$ kilometers per hour. The truck and the bus start from both locations at the same time and travel towards each other. Find: (2) How many hours are there between the first time they are $$130$$ kilometers apart and the second time they are $$130$$ kilometers apart?
甲、乙两车分别从相距$$280$$千米的$$A$$、$$B$$两地同时出发，相向: Cars A and B start simultaneously from two places, A and B, which are $$280$$ kilometers apart, and travel towards each other. They meet after $$8$$ hours. After meeting, both cars continue to travel, and after another $$6$$ hours, car A arrives at location B. At that time, how many kilometers is car B from location A?
甲、乙两辆汽车从相距$$942$$千米的两地相向而行，甲车每小时行$$45$$千: Cars A and B are traveling towards each other from two locations that are $$942$$ kilometers apart. Car A travels at $$45$$ kilometers per hour, and Car B travels at $$41$$ kilometers per hour. Car B departs $$2$$ hours earlier than Car A. After how many hours does Car A meet Car B?
甲、乙两地相距$$480$$千米，一辆汽车在早上$$8$$点从甲地出发，以每小时: The distance between point A and point B is $$480$$ kilometers. A car departs from point A at $$8$$ AM, traveling towards point B at a speed of $$40$$ kilometers per hour. After $$3$$ hours, another car departs from point B towards point A at a speed of $$50$$ kilometers per hour. At what time will the two cars meet on the way? (24-hour format)
甲、乙两地相距$$200$$千米，薇儿去时的速度是$$10$$千米/时，回来的速: The distance between point A and point B is $$200$$ kilometers. Wei Er's speed on the way there is $$10$$ kilometers/hour, and the speed on the way back is $$40$$ kilometers/hour. What is Wei Er's average speed for the round trip in kilometers/hour?
从$$A$$到$$B$$是$$12$$千米下坡路，从$$B$$到$$C$$是$$: From $$A$$ to $$B$$ is $$12$$ kilometers downhill, from $$B$$ to $$C$$ is $$8$$ kilometers on flat ground, and from $$C$$ to $$D$$ is $$4$$ kilometers uphill. Xiao Zhang walks, with a downhill speed of $$6$$ kilometers/hour, a flat speed of $$4$$ kilometers/hour, and an uphill speed of $$2$$ kilometers/hour. What is Xiao Zhang's average speed in kilometers per hour from $$A$$ to $$D$$?
薇儿和艾迪两家相距$$1170$$米，两人同时从家出发在同一条路上相向而行，薇儿: Wei Er and Eddie's homes are $$1170$$ meters apart. They both set off from home at the same time and walk towards each other on the same road. Wei Er walks $$60$$ meters per minute, and Eddie walks $$70$$ meters per minute. After how many minutes do they meet?
甲、乙两地相距$$300$$米，加加去时的速度是$$10$$米/分，回来的速度是: The distance between point A and point B is $$300$$ meters. If the speed going there is $$10$$ meters/minute and the speed returning is $$15$$ meters/minute, what is the average speed for the round trip in meters/minute?
艾迪、薇儿分别驾车从$$A$$、$$B$$两城同时出发相向而行，艾迪的车每小时行: Eddie and Vera started driving towards each other from cities $$A$$ and $$B$$ at the same time. Eddie's car travels $$56$$ kilometers per hour, and Vera's car travels $$43$$ kilometers per hour. After $$5$$ hours, they meet. What is the distance between the two cities?
一段$$600$$千米的路程，小美前一半路程用$$10$$千米/时的速度行走，后: A journey of $$600$$ kilometers, Xiaomei walks the first half of the distance at a speed of $$10$$ km/h and the second half at a speed of $$15$$ km/h. What is Xiaomei's average speed for the entire journey in km/h?
$$A$$、$$B$$两地相距$$780$$千米，货车每小时行$$56$$千米，: The distance between points $$A$$ and $$B$$ is $$780$$ kilometers. The truck travels at $$56$$ kilometers per hour, and the passenger bus travels at $$74$$ kilometers per hour. If both vehicles depart from point $$A$$ to point $$B$$ at the same time and return immediately after arriving at point $$B$$, how many hours will it take for the two vehicles to meet for the first time, and how far from point $$B$$ will they be when they meet?
甲、乙两车分别从相距$$901$$千米的两地相向而行，甲车每小时行$$45$$千: Cars A and B are heading towards each other from two locations that are $$901$$ kilometers apart. Car A travels at $$45$$ kilometers per hour, and Car B travels at $$41$$ kilometers per hour. Car B departs one hour earlier than Car A. After how many hours does Car A meet Car B?
苏步青教授是我国著名的数学家．有一次他在电车上碰到一位有名的德国数学家，这位数学: Professor Su Buqing is a famous mathematician in our country. One time, he met a well-known German mathematician on a tram, and this mathematician posed an interesting problem for him to solve. The problem is: "Two places are 50 kilometers apart, and two people, A and B, set off from both places at the same time, walking towards each other. A walks 3 kilometers per hour, and B walks 2 kilometers per hour. A has a dog that walks 5 kilometers per hour. The dog starts with A, turns around when it meets B, runs back to A when it meets A again, and continues this until A and B meet. How many kilometers has the dog walked in total?" Professor Su Buqing thought for a moment and told the German mathematician the correct answer before he got off the tram. Students, can you try to find out how many kilometers the dog walked in total?
有一座桥，过桥需要先上坡，再走一段平路，最后下坡．总路程为$$18$$千米，并且: There is a bridge that requires going uphill first, then walking a flat section, and finally going downhill. The total distance is $$18$$ kilometers, and the distances for uphill, flat road, and downhill are equal. When a person walks across the bridge, their speeds for uphill, flat road, and downhill are $$2$$ kilometers/hour, $$3$$ kilometers/hour, and $$6$$ kilometers/hour respectively. What is their average speed across the bridge in kilometers/hour?

If B flies at $$340$$ kilometers per hour and A flies at $$420$$ kilometers per hour, how many hours will it take for A to catch up to B?
货车和客车分别从相距$$360$$千米的甲、乙两地同时出发，同向而行，货车在前客: A truck and a passenger car start from two places, A and B, which are $$360$$ kilometers apart, at the same time, moving in the same direction, with the truck in front and the passenger car behind. The truck travels at $$50$$ kilometers per hour and is caught up by the passenger car after $$9$$ hours. What is the speed of the passenger car in kilometers per hour?
一辆慢车从甲地开往乙地，每小时行$$40$$千米，开出$$5$$小时后，一辆快车: A slow train travels from point A to point B at a speed of $$40$$ kilometers per hour. After traveling for $$5$$ hours, a fast train also departs from point A to point B at a speed of $$90$$ kilometers per hour. The fast train catches up with the slow train at the midpoint between points A and B. How far apart are points A and B?
三年级同学从学校出发去春游，每分钟走$$72$$米，$$15$$分钟后，学校有急: Third grade students set off from school for a spring outing, walking $$72$$ meters per minute. After $$15$$ minutes, the school had an urgent matter to notify the students and sent Teacher Li on a bicycle, departing from the school at a speed of $$132$$ meters per minute to catch up with the students. How many minutes does Teacher Li need to catch up? If Teacher Li wants to catch up in $$9$$ minutes, how many meters per minute does he need to travel?
甲、乙两地相距$$240$$千米，一辆慢车从甲地出发，每小时行$$60$$千米．: The distance between point A and point B is $$240$$ kilometers. A slow train departs from point A, traveling at $$60$$ kilometers per hour. At the same time, a fast train departs from point B, traveling at $$90$$ kilometers per hour. Both trains are moving in the same direction, with the fast train behind the slow train. After how many hours will the fast train catch up with the slow train?
小白和小新赛跑，小新在小白前面$$1200$$米处，他们同时出发，同向而行，已知: Xiao Bai and Xiao Xin are racing, with Xiao Xin starting $$1200$$ meters ahead of Xiao Bai. They start at the same time and run in the same direction. It is known that Xiao Xin runs $$150$$ meters per minute. After $$10$$ minutes, Xiao Bai catches up to Xiao Xin. What is the speed of Xiao Bai in meters per minute?
甲、乙两地相距$$220$$千米，小明和小李开车分别从甲乙两地同时出发，同向而行: The distance between points A and B is $$220$$ kilometers. Xiao Ming and Xiao Li start driving from points A and B at the same time, going in the same direction, with Xiao Ming in front and Xiao Li behind. It is known that Xiao Ming travels at $$50$$ kilometers per hour and Xiao Li at $$60$$ kilometers per hour. How long will it take for Xiao Li to catch up with Xiao Ming?
甲、乙两人同时从两地相向而行．甲每小时行$$5$$千米，乙每小时行$$4$$千米: Two people, A and B, walk towards each other from two places at the same time. A walks $$5$$ kilometers per hour, while B walks $$4$$ kilometers per hour. When they meet, they are $$3$$ kilometers away from the midpoint. What is the distance between the two places?
甲、乙两人骑车同时从$$A$$地去$$B$$地，甲每分钟行$$150$$米，乙分: Two people, A and B, ride bicycles simultaneously from point A to point B. A travels $$150$$ meters per minute, while B travels $$120$$ meters per minute. After A reaches point B, he immediately returns and meets B at point C. If point C is $$300$$ meters away from point B, what is the distance between points A and B in meters?
艾迪和薇儿从相距$$1500$$米的两地同时出发，若相向而行，$$10$$分钟相: Eddie and Weir started simultaneously from two places that are $$1500$$ meters apart. If they walk towards each other, they meet in $$10$$ minutes; if they walk in the same direction, Eddie catches up with Weir in $$75$$ minutes. What are Eddie's and Weir's speeds in meters per minute?
两地相距$$900$$千米，甲需走$$15$$天，乙需走$$12$$天．现在甲先: Two places are $$900$$ kilometers apart. A needs $$15$$ days to cover the distance, while B needs $$12$$ days. Now A starts first and walks for $$2$$ days, then B goes to catch up with A. How many kilometers must B travel to catch up with A?
乌龟和兔子进行$$1000$$米赛跑，兔子的速度是乌龟的$$5$$倍，当它们从起: In a race of $$1000$$ meters between a turtle and a rabbit, the rabbit's speed is $$5$$ times that of the turtle. After they both start from the starting point at the same time, the turtle keeps running, while the rabbit runs to a certain point and starts sleeping. When the rabbit wakes up, the turtle has already taken the lead. The rabbit then chases after the turtle, but when the turtle reaches the finish line, the rabbit is still $$10$$ meters behind. How many meters did the turtle run during the rabbit's sleep?

在黑板上写$$2$$，$$3$$，$$5$$三个整数，然后擦去一个换成其它两数之: Write the integers $$2$$, $$3$$, and $$5$$ on the blackboard, then erase one and replace it with the sum of the other two. If you continue this process, can you eventually obtain $$100$$, $$144$$, and $$244$$? Please explain your reasoning.
柜子里放有$$7$$个开口向上的杯子．第一次翻动其中$$1$$个，第二次翻动其中: There are $$7$$ cups in the cabinet, all with their openings facing up. 已知艾迪每分钟走$$90$$米，薇儿每分钟走$$60$$米，他们分别由$$A$$: Eddie walks $$90$$ meters per minute, and Veer walks $$60$$ meters per minute. They both depart from points $$A$$ and $$B$$ at the same time. If they walk towards each other, they meet after $$10$$ minutes; if they walk in the same direction, how many minutes does it take for Eddie to catch up with Veer?
森林里的小动物们外出郊游，它们排成了一列长$$40$$米的队伍，以每秒$$3$$: The small animals in the forest went out for an outing, forming a long line of $$40$$ meters and moving at a speed of $$3$$ meters per second. How many seconds does it take for the rabbit to return to the back of the line?
一列队伍长$$600$$米，以每秒钟$$2$$米的速度行进．一战士因事要从排尾赶: A line of troops is $$600$$ meters long, moving at a speed of $$2$$ meters per second. A soldier needs to rush from the back to the front of the line and immediately return to the back. If he walks at $$3$$ meters per second, how many meters does he travel in total for the round trip?
艾迪和薇儿分别站在一条长$$200$$米的笔直路的$$A$$、$$B$$两端相向: Eddie and Weir are standing at points A and B, respectively, at either end of a straight road that is $$200$$ meters long, walking towards each other. Before Eddie starts, a dog runs at a speed of $$8$$ meters/second from point A towards Weir. After the dog has run for $$5$$ seconds, both Eddie and Weir start running to catch the dog at the same time (the paths of the two people and the dog are all straight lines), with both Weir and Eddie having a speed of $$12$$ meters/second. Question: Who will meet the dog first, Eddie or Weir?
甲乙两车同时从$$A$$、$$B$$两地相对开出，$$4$$小时相遇，甲车再行$: Car A and Car B start from points A and B at the same time and drive towards each other, meeting after $$4$$ hours. Car A then continues for $$3$$ more hours to reach point B. Car A travels $$20$$ kilometers per hour more than Car B. How many kilometers apart are points A and B?

Now, we are going to dye the five garbage bins one of three colors: red, green, or blue, with the requirement that adjacent bins must be different colors and the bin for recycling paper cannot be dyed red. 用$$5$$种不同的颜色给下面的图形染色，要求相邻的区域（有公共边的两区域称为相: Use $$5$$ different colors to color the shapes below, ensuring that adjacent regions (two regions sharing a common edge are called adjacent) are colored differently. If colors can be reused, how many different coloring methods are there?
如图，地图上有$$A$$，$$B$$，$$C$$，$$D$$四个国家，现用五种颜: In the figure, there are four countries $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, and $$D$$ on the map. If we use five colors to color the map, how many different coloring methods can be used so that adjacent countries do not have the same color?
由数字$$0$$，$$2$$，$$3$$，$$4$$，$$5$$，$$6$$，$: How many five-digit even numbers can be formed using the digits $$0$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, $$4$$, $$5$$, $$6$$, $$7$$, $$8$$, and $$9$$ without repeating any digits?
东东有$$9$$张卡片，其中$$4$$张卡片上写有数字$$2$$，$$2$$张卡: Dong Dong has $$9$$ cards, among which $$4$$ cards have the number $$2$$ written on them, $$2$$ cards have the number $$3$$ written on them, and $$3$$ cards have the number $$5$$ written on them. If we randomly take several cards from these cards and calculate the product of the numbers on the cards (we can take just $$1$$ card or all $$9$$ cards), how many different products can we obtain in total?
如果从$$15$$本不同的语文书、$$20$$本不同的数学书、$$10$$本不同: If you choose $$2$$ books from different subjects out of $$15$$ different language books, $$20$$ different math books, and $$10$$ different foreign language books, how many different selections are there?
规定$$\\odot $$表示的运算如下，$$a\\odot b=8\\time: The operation represented by $$\odot$$ is defined as follows: $$a \odot b = 8 \times a - b$$. Calculate: (1) What is $$\left( 4 \odot 2 \right) \odot 3$$? (2) If $$x \odot 7 = 65$$, what is $$x$$?
定义$$a*b$$为$$a$$与$$b$$之间（包含$$a$$、$$b$$）所有: Define $$a*b$$ as the average of all natural numbers with the same parity as $$a$$ between $$a$$ and $$b$$ (including $$a$$ and $$b$$). For example: $$7*14=(7+9+11+13)\div 4=10$$, $$18*10=(18+16+14+12+10)\div 5=14$$. What natural number should be placed in the box in the equation □$$*(19*99)=80$$ to make the equation hold true?
规定“$$\\odot $$”表示运算：$$a\\odot b=3\\times: It is defined that “$$\odot $$” represents the operation: $$a\odot b=3\times a+2\times b$$. Calculate: (1) What is $$4\odot 5$$? (2) What is $$4\odot 2\odot 3$$? (3) What is $$4\odot (2\odot 3)$$?

节日期间在一个$$6$$层楼房上安装彩灯，共安装彩灯$$666$$盏，已知从第二: During the holiday season, a total of $$666$$ colorful lights were installed on a $$6$$-story building. It is known that starting from the second floor, each floor has $$6$$ fewer lights than the one below. How many lights were installed on the top floor?
有五个互不相等的非零自然数，最小的一个数是$$7$$．如果其中一个减少$$20$: There are five distinct non-zero natural numbers, the smallest of which is $$7$$. If one of them is decreased by $$20$$ and the other four are increased by $$5$$, the result will still be these five numbers. What is the sum of these five numbers?
$$n\\forall b$$表示$$n$$的$$3$$倍减去$$b$$．例如：: $$n \forall b$$ represents three times $$n$$ minus $$b$$. For example: $$1 \forall 2 = 1 \times 3 - 2 = 1$$, then what is $$10 \forall 6$$?
等差数列：$$7$$ ,$$11$$ ,$$15$$, $$\\ldots $$: In an arithmetic sequence: $$7$$, $$11$$, $$15$$, $$\ldots$$, what is the $$30$$th term?
一动车往返于长沙和武汉之间，全程停靠$$4$$个站，共需准备种不同的车票．: A train travels back and forth between Changsha and Wuhan, stopping at $$4$$ stations along the way. How many different tickets need to be prepared?
如果一个等差数串的第$$4$$个数为$$31$$，第$$7$$个数为$$49$$: If the 4th term of an arithmetic sequence is $$31$$ and the 7th term is $$49$$, what is the 10th term?
用$$4$$种颜色的水彩笔给“$$ABCD$$”四个字母涂颜色，要求不同字母用不: Using $$4$$ different colors of watercolor pens to color the letters "$$ABCD$$", with the requirement that different letters must be colored with different pens, how many different color combinations are possible?
在一个等差数列中，首项为$$11$$，第$$11$$项为$$51$$，求公差是．: In an arithmetic sequence, if the first term is $$11$$ and the $$11$$th term is $$51$$, what is the common difference?
地图上有$$A$$，$$B$$，$$C$$，$$D$$四个国家(如下图)，现有红: There are four countries on the map: $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, and $$D$$ (as shown in the figure). There are five colors: red, yellow, blue, green, and purple available to color the map, ensuring that adjacent countries have different colors. However, not every color must be used. How many coloring methods are there?
有五个滑轮的直径成等差数串，已知最小的和最大的滑轮直径分别是$$120$$毫米和: There are five pulleys with diameters that form an arithmetic sequence. Given that the smallest and largest pulley diameters are $$120$$ mm and $$216$$ mm respectively, what is the diameter of the second pulley in mm, the diameter of the third pulley in mm, and the diameter of the fourth pulley in mm?
幼儿园$$378$$个小朋友围成若干个圆（一圈套一圈）做游戏，已知最内圈$$22: In a kindergarten, $$378$$ children are forming several circles (one circle inside another) to play games. It is known that the innermost circle has $$22$$ people and the outermost circle has $$62$$ people. If the number of people differs equally between adjacent circles, what is the difference in the number of people between two adjacent circles?
有一堆粗细均匀的圆木，堆成梯形，自上而下，每向下一层增加一根，一共堆了$$28$: There is a pile of evenly thick logs arranged in a trapezoid shape. Starting from the top, each lower layer has one more log than the layer above it, with a total of $$28$$ layers, and the bottom layer has $$32$$ logs. How many logs are there in total?
有一张纸，第一次把它剪成$$7$$块；第二次从第一次所得的纸片中任取一块，再剪成: There is a piece of paper. The first time it is cut into $$7$$ pieces; the second time, one of the pieces from the first cut is randomly chosen and cut into $$7$$ pieces again; the third time, one piece from all the pieces obtained before is randomly chosen and cut into $$7$$ pieces, and this continues. After the $$10$$th cut, how many pieces of paper are there in total? Is it possible that after some cut, the total number of pieces of paper is exactly $$2019$$? (Fill in yes or no)
一个自然数能够表示成$$5$$个连续的自然数之和，也可以表示成$$7$$个连续的: A natural number can be expressed as the sum of $$5$$ consecutive natural numbers and also as the sum of $$7$$ consecutive natural numbers. What are the first $$3$$ natural numbers that meet the above conditions, listed in ascending order?
如果一个等差数串的第$$4$$个数为$$21$$，第$$6$$个数为$$33$$: If the 4th term of an arithmetic sequence is $$21$$ and the 6th term is $$33$$, what is the 8th term?
$$10\\sim 90$$中所有是$$3$$的倍数的数，它们的和是．: What is the sum of all the multiples of $$3$$ between $$10$$ and $$90$$?
对于数串$$4$$、$$7$$、$$10$$、$$13$$、$$16$$、$$1: For the number sequence $$4$$, $$7$$, $$10$$, $$13$$, $$16$$, $$19$$, $$\cdots$$, what is the $$10$$th number? Which term is $$49$$ in this sequence? What is the difference between the $$100$$th number and the $$50$$th number?
薇儿先在黑板上写了一个等差数串，刚写完艾迪就冲上讲台，擦去了其中的大部分数．只留: Vera first wrote an arithmetic sequence on the blackboard. As soon as she finished, Eddie rushed to the podium and erased most of the numbers, leaving only the fourth number $$31$$ and the tenth number $$73$$. What is the difference between two adjacent numbers in this arithmetic sequence, and what is the first number?
一个数串共有$$13$$个数，每一个数都比它的前一个数多$$7$$，并且第$$1: There is a sequence of $$13$$ numbers, each number is $$7$$ more than the previous one, and the $$13$$th number is $$125$$. What is the $$1$$st number?
为庆祝建校$$16$$周年，学而思学校组织了一场运动会．开幕式上，各年级的代表队: To celebrate the 16th anniversary of the school, Xueersi School organized a sports meeting. During the opening ceremony, the representative teams from each grade entered in turn to perform. The first-grade students formed a solid square formation to perform gymnastics, with $$18$$ people on each side of the outer layer. How many people are there in the entire square formation?
运动会结束后，所有的学生前往体育馆参与闭幕式．志愿者们用美丽的花儿来为运动健儿们: After the sports meeting, all the students went to the gym to participate in the closing ceremony. The volunteers used beautiful flowers to congratulate the athletes and arranged a five-layer hollow square flower bed on the open space in front of the gym, using a total of $$240$$ pots of flowers. How many pots of flowers are there in the middle layer? How many pots of flowers are there in the outer layer? How many pots of flowers are there in the inner layer?
有一群学生排成三层空心方阵，多$$9$$人，如果空心部分增加两层，又少$$15$: There is a group of students arranged in a three-layer hollow square formation, with $$9$$ more people. If the hollow part increases by two layers, there will be $$15$$ fewer people. How many students are there?
为了准备学校的集体舞比赛，三年级的学生在排队形．如果排成$$3$$层空心的方阵则: In order to prepare for the school's group dance competition, the third-grade students are lining up. If they form a hollow square matrix with $$3$$ layers, there are $$10$$ more people than needed. If an additional layer is added to the hollow part in the middle, there are $$6$$ fewer people than needed. How many students are participating in the rehearsal?
如果有一个$$3$$层的空心三角阵，最外层每边有$$17$$枚棋子，那么一共有枚: If there is a hollow triangular formation with $$3$$ layers, and there are $$17$$ pieces on each side of the outer layer, how many pieces are there in total?
四年级一班同学参加了广播操比赛，排成每行$$8$$人，每列$$8$$人的方阵，问: In the fourth grade class, students participated in a radio exercise competition, forming a square formation with $$8$$ people in each row and $$8$$ people in each column. How many students are there in total in the square formation, and how many students are left if one row and one column are removed?
新学期开始，手持鲜花的少先队员在一辆彩车四周围成了每边两层的方阵，最外面一层每边: As the new semester begins, the Young Pioneers holding flowers form a square formation around a float, with two layers on each side. The outer layer has $$13$$ people on each side. How many Young Pioneers are there around the float?
用红、绿两种颜色的小正方形瓷砖铺成一块正方形墙面：由外到内算起，这个墙面最外层铺: A square wall is covered with red and green square tiles. Starting from the outermost layer, the first layer is red tiles, the second layer is green tiles, the third layer is red tiles, the fourth layer is green tiles, and so on. In total, $$400$$ tiles are used. How many tiles are there in total?
学校要进行一个体操表演节目，站成一个$$10$$行的三角形阵．（１）一共有人参加: The school is going to hold a gymnastics performance, arranged in a triangular formation with $$10$$ rows. (1) How many people are participating in the performance? (2) If the people in the outermost circle are given ribbons, how many people have ribbons?
有$$196$$枚围棋子，摆成一个$$14\\times 14$$的实心方阵，甲: There are $$196$$ Go pieces arranged in a solid square matrix of $$14 \times 14$$. Player A and Player B take turns removing all the pieces from each layer starting from the outermost layer until all the pieces are taken. How many more pieces did Player A take than Player B?
阳光小学的学生在操场上排成一个实心方阵，已知方阵最外面一圈都是男生，往内一圈都是: The students at Sunshine Primary School are arranged in a solid square formation on the playground. It is known that the outermost layer of the square is all boys, the next layer is all girls, then boys again, and so on, until the innermost layer. If the total number of boys is $$52$$ more than the total number of girls, what is the total number of students?
某部队战士排成实心方阵行军，另一支队伍共$$31$$人加入他们的方阵，正好使横竖: A certain unit of soldiers is marching in a solid square formation. Another team with a total of $$31$$ people joins their formation, which exactly increases both the rows and columns by one. How many soldiers are there in total now?
艾迪用一些棋子摆成了一个两层的空心方阵，后来他又多摆上去$$28$$枚棋子，使得: Eddie arranged some pieces into a two-layer hollow square matrix, and then he added $$28$$ more pieces, turning the shape into a three-layer hollow square matrix. What is the maximum number of pieces Eddie could have originally arranged, and what is the minimum number of pieces he could have arranged?
希望小学四年级的学生排成一个实心方阵队列，还剩下$$5$$人，如果横竖各增加一排: Students in the fourth grade of Xiwang Primary School lined up in a solid square formation, with $$5$$ people remaining. If one row is added both horizontally and vertically to form a slightly larger solid square, then $$26$$ people are missing. How many students are there in the fourth grade of Xiwang Primary School?
$$120$$个棋子摆成一个三层空心方阵，最内层每边有个棋子．: $$120$$ chess pieces are arranged in a three-layer hollow square formation, with each side of the innermost layer having how many chess pieces?
某校四年级学生排成一个方阵，最外一层的人数为$$40$$人．那么方阵最外层每边有: Students in the fourth grade of a certain school are arranged in a square formation, with $$40$$ people in the outermost layer. How many people are there on each side of the outer layer of the square formation, and what is the total number of people in the square formation?
某某理发室里只有一位理发师，但是同时来了五位顾客，根据他们所要理的发型，分别需要: In a certain barbershop, there is only one barber, but five customers arrived at the same time. Based on the hairstyles they want, they need $$10$$, $$12$$, $$15$$, $$20$$, and $$24$$ minutes respectively. How should they arrange their haircut order to minimize the total time spent waiting and getting their hair cut? What is the minimum time in minutes?
现在理发店里有两位理发师，同时来了$$6$$位顾客，根据他们所要理的发型，分别需: There are two barbers in the barbershop, and $$6$$ customers have arrived at the same time. Depending on the hairstyles they want, they need $$8$$, $$10$$, $$12$$, $$15$$, $$20$$, and $$24$$ minutes respectively. How can we arrange their haircut order reasonably to minimize the total waiting time (including haircut time) for the $$6$$ people? What is the minimum time in minutes?
有$$8$$个人各拿着一只提桶同时到水龙头前打水，水龙头注满第一个人的桶需要$$: There are $$8$$ people each holding a bucket, and they all go to the faucet to fetch water at the same time. It takes $$1$$ minute to fill the first person's bucket, $$2$$ minutes for the second person's bucket, and so on. (1) When there is only one faucet, how should these $$8$$ people be arranged to minimize their total fetching and waiting time? What is the minimum time in minutes?

There are $$8$$ people each holding a bucket who go to the faucet to fill water at the same time. It takes $$1$$ minute to fill the first person's bucket, $$2$$ minutes to fill the second person's bucket, and so on. When there are two faucets, how can these $$8$$ people be arranged to fill water so that their total filling and waiting time is minimized? What is the minimum time in minutes?
阳光电车公司维修站有$$7$$辆电车需要维修，如果用一名工人维修这$$7$$辆电: The Sunshine Tram Company maintenance station has $$7$$ trams that need repairs. If one worker takes $$12$$, $$17$$, $$8$$, $$18$$, $$23$$, $$30$$, and $$14$$ minutes to repair these $$7$$ trams respectively, and the loss for each tram for every minute of downtime is $$11$$ yuan, what is the minimum economic loss when $$3$$ workers with the same efficiency work individually and are reasonably arranged to minimize the loss?
解答下列各题：如图，在街道上有$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D$$、$: Answer the following questions: As shown in the figure, there are five residential buildings $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$ on the street, each with the same number of residents. Where should the bus station be located to minimize the sum of the distances from the bus station to the residents of the five buildings?

Solve the following problems: As shown in the figure, there are six residential buildings $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, $$E$$, and $$F$$ on the street, with the same number of people in each building. Now, if a bus stop is to be set up, where should the stop be located to minimize the total distance residents have to travel to reach the stop?
解答下列各题：如图，一条路上从西向东有$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D: Answer the following questions: In the figure, there are five schools, $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$, located on a road from west to east, with $$200$$, $$300$$, $$400$$, $$500$$, and $$600$$ people respectively. The distance between any two adjacent schools is $$100$$ meters. A bus station is to be built at the entrance of one of the schools to minimize the total distance all people must travel to reach the station. Where should the bus station be located?
如图是$$A$$，$$B$$，$$C$$，$$D$$，$$E$$五个村之间的道路: In the figure, there are five villages: $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$. The numbers in the circles represent the number of students who need to go to school in each village, and the numbers on the roads represent the distance between the villages (unit: kilometers). Now, we need to choose one village to establish a primary school among the five villages. To minimize the total distance all students have to travel to school, where should the primary school be built?
有一个水塔要提供某条公路旁的$$6$$个居民点用水（如图，单位：千米），要安装的: There is a water tower that needs to supply water to $$6$$ residential areas along a certain road (as shown in the figure, units: kilometers). There are two types of pipes to be installed: thick pipes that can supply water to all $$6$$ residential areas, and thin pipes that can only supply water to $$1$$ residential area. The cost of the thick pipe is $$7000$$ yuan per kilogram, and the cost of the thin pipe is $$2000$$ yuan per kilometer. How should this project be arranged to minimize costs, and what should the total cost be in yuan?
按要求解答问题．（1）北京、深圳分别有$$10$$台和$$6$$台完全相同的机器: Answer the questions as required. (1) Beijing and Shenzhen have $$10$$ and $$6$$ identical machines respectively, planning to send $$11$$ machines to Wuhan and $$5$$ machines to Xi'an. The shipping cost per machine is shown in the table. If the total shipping cost is minimized, what is the minimum shipping cost in yuan?
按要求解答问题．（2）北京、上海分别有$$10$$台和$$6$$台完全相同的机器: Answer the questions as required. (2) Beijing and Shanghai have $$10$$ and $$6$$ identical machines, respectively, and plan to send $$11$$ machines to Wuhan and $$5$$ machines to Xi'an. The shipping cost for each machine is shown in the table. If the total shipping cost is minimized, what is the minimum shipping cost?
已知$$5$$支一包的红笔$$61$$元，蓝笔$$70$$元；$$3$$支一包的: Given that a pack of $$5$$ red pens costs $$61$$ yuan and blue pens cost $$70$$ yuan; a pack of $$3$$ red pens costs $$40$$ yuan and blue pens cost $$47$$ yuan; purchases must be made in packs. If at least $$47$$ red pens and $$47$$ blue pens are purchased, what is the minimum expenditure in yuan?
有十个村，坐落大县城出发的一条公路上（如下图所示，距离单位是千米），要安装水管，: There are ten villages located along a road starting from the county city (as shown in the figure, with the distance unit in kilometers). Water pipes need to be installed to supply tap water from the county city to each village. There are two types of pipes available: thick pipes can supply water to all villages, while thin pipes can only supply water to one village. The cost of the thick pipe is $$8000$$ yuan per kilometer, and the cost of the thin pipe is $$2000$$ yuan per kilometer. By appropriately combining and connecting the thick and thin pipes, the total project cost can be reduced. What do you think the most economical cost should be in yuan?
在一条公路上每隔$$100$$千米有一个仓库（如图），共有$$5$$个仓库，一号: On a highway, there is a warehouse every $$100$$ kilometers (as shown in the figure), with a total of $$5$$ warehouses. Warehouse number one has $$10$$ tons of goods, warehouse number two has $$20$$ tons of goods, and warehouse number five has $$40$$ tons of goods, while the other two warehouses are empty. Now, if we want to concentrate all the goods in one warehouse, and it costs $$1$$ yuan to transport each ton of goods for $$1$$ kilometer, what is the minimum transportation cost?
车间里有八台车床同时出现故障，已知第一台到第八台修复时间依次为$$4$$，$$8: There are eight lathes broken down in the workshop, with the repair times for the first to the eighth lathe being $$4$$, $$8$$, $$9$$, $$12$$, $$13$$, $$16$$, $$15$$, and $$14$$ minutes, respectively. There are two repair workers with the same efficiency, and the goal is to schedule the repairs so that the total time from the start of repairs to their completion is the shortest. What is this shortest time in minutes?
南、北两仓库分别有$$30$$吨、$$20$$吨的货物，准备运给甲仓库$$15$:
The South and North warehouses have $$30$$ tons and $$20$$ tons of goods respectively, and are preparing to transport $$15$$ tons to Warehouse A, $$25$$ tons to Warehouse B, and $$10$$ tons to Warehouse C. The transportation costs per ton are shown in the table below (unit: yuan). What is the minimum transportation cost in yuan?

如图：每行的左边和每列的上边所标数字代表该行、列连续黑色方块的数量．小朋友们，你: As shown in the figure: The numbers marked on the left of each row and at the top of each column represent the number of consecutive black squares in that row or column. Can you mark all the black squares based on these numbers?

As shown in the figure: The numbers marked on the left of each row and at the top of each column represent the number of continuous black squares in that row or column. Can you, kids, mark all the black squares based on these numbers?

将$$125$$只羊赶入$$6$$个羊圈中，羊的只数最多的羊圈中至少有只羊．: If $$125$$ sheep are herded into $$6$$ sheep pens, how many sheep are there at least in the sheep pen with the most sheep?
一些同学去向管理员借$$50$$个篮球．管理员说：你们一次都拿走的话，一定会有一: Some students went to borrow $$50$$ basketballs from the administrator. The administrator said: If you take them all at once, at least one person will have to take $$8$$ or more. What is the maximum number of students?
一副扑克牌共$$54$$张，其中有$$2$$张王牌，还有黑桃、红心、梅花和方块四: In a deck of playing cards, there are a total of $$54$$ cards, including $$2$$ jokers, and there are $$13$$ cards each of the four suits: spades, hearts, clubs, and diamonds. How many cards must be drawn at a minimum to ensure that all four suits are drawn?

In a deck of playing cards, there are a total of $$54$$ cards, including $$2$$ jokers, and there are $$13$$ cards each of the four suits: spades, hearts, clubs, and diamonds. How many cards must be drawn at a minimum to guarantee that there is at least one "pair" (two jokers count as a pair)?
一副扑克牌去掉大小王有$$52$$张，其中有黑桃、红心、梅花和方块四种花色，每种: In a deck of playing cards, there are $$52$$ cards after removing the jokers, which include four suits: spades, hearts, clubs, and diamonds. Each suit has $$13$$ cards numbered from $$1$$ to $$13$$. How many cards must be drawn at a minimum to ensure that at least one spade is drawn?
有黄色袜子$$9$$只，绿色袜子$$7$$只，白色袜子$$4$$只，红色袜子$$: There are $$9$$ yellow socks, $$7$$ green socks, $$4$$ white socks, $$2$$ red socks, and $$1$$ black sock. If Eddie closes his eyes and feels the socks, how many socks does he need to touch at least to guarantee that he can make $$2$$ pairs of the same color?
将$$17$$个苹果放入$$3$$个抽屉，分到苹果最多的抽屉至少有个苹果．: If $$17$$ apples are placed into $$3$$ drawers, how many apples must be in the drawer with the most apples at least?
要把$$31$$个乒乓球分装在$$5$$个乒乓球盒中，每个盒子至少装$$1$$个: To distribute $$31$$ table tennis balls into $$5$$ boxes, with each box containing at least $$1$$ ball, how many balls are in the box with the most balls at a minimum?
盒子里有四种不同颜色的卡片，$$100$$、$$90$$、$$80$$和$$70: There are four different colors of cards in the box, with $$100$$, $$90$$, $$80$$, and $$70$$ cards respectively. You can exchange $$59$$ cards of the same color for one pencil case of the same color, $$46$$ cards of the same color for one notebook of the same color, and $$24$$ cards of the same color for one mechanical pencil of the same color. What is the maximum number of cards that can be taken out at once, while still being unable to guarantee that the taken cards can be exchanged for one of each type of stationery, with each being a different color?
桌子上有$$5$$个黑球、$$6$$个白球、$$7$$个红球，闭上眼睛至少抽个才: There are $$5$$ black balls, $$6$$ white balls, and $$7$$ red balls on the table. How many balls must you draw with your eyes closed to ensure that you get at least one of each color?
将$$50$$只牛赶入$$7$$个牛栏，牛最多的牛栏中至少有只牛．: If $$50$$ cows are driven into $$7$$ cow pens, how many cows are there at least in the pen with the most cows?
每天中午班上发$$25$$个苹果，不管怎么分，总有人至少分到$$3$$个苹果，那: Every day at noon, the class distributes $$25$$ apples. No matter how they are divided, there is always at least one person who receives $$3$$ apples. What is the maximum number of people in the class?
任意$$40$$个人中，至少有个人属于同一个生肖．: In any group of $$40$$ people, at least how many of them belong to the same zodiac sign?
幼儿园阿姨有$$72$$颗糖，最多给名小朋友发糖果，能保证无论怎么分，总有小朋友: The kindergarten aunt has $$72$$ candies. If she distributes them to a maximum number of children, how many children can she ensure receive at least $$3$$ candies each, no matter how they are distributed?
三年$$3$$班$$45$$名同学都是同一年出生的．下面的说法正确的是（ ）．: All $$45$$ students in Class $$3$$ of the third grade were born in the same year. Which of the following statements is correct?
学生们手中有$$1$$、$$2$$、$$3$$三种数字卡片，每种卡片都有很多张．: Students have cards with the numbers $$1$$, $$2$$, and $$3$$, and there are many cards of each type. The teacher asks each student to take out two or three cards to form a two-digit or three-digit number. If at least three students form the same number, how many students must there be at minimum?
一副扑克牌共$$54$$张，其中有黑桃、黑梅、红桃和红方四种花色，每种花色都有$: A deck of playing cards has a total of $$54$$ cards, including spades, clubs, hearts, and diamonds, each with cards numbered from $$1$$ to $$13$$, and there are also $$2$$ jokers. How many cards must you draw to ensure that at least two of the drawn cards have the same rank and suit? (Assuming the jokers have no rank.)
一信号兵有很多红、黄、蓝三种颜色的信号旗，可以从中任意取出一面、两面或三面排成一: A signalman has many signal flags in red, yellow, and blue colors, and can take out one, two, or three flags to arrange them in a row to represent various signals. Therefore, among $$300$$ signals, how many signals must be exactly the same?
口袋里有一些大小形状相同的球：红球有$$8$$个，绿球有$$10$$个，黄球有$: In the pocket, there are some balls of the same size and shape: there are $$8$$ red balls, $$10$$ green balls, $$12$$ yellow balls, and $$15$$ white balls. How many balls must be taken at least to ensure that there are at least $$3$$ balls of one color, $$6$$ balls of another color, and $$9$$ balls of a third color?
现有$$211$$名同学和四种不同的巧克力， 每种巧克力的数量都超过$$633$: There are currently $$211$$ students and four different types of chocolates, with each type having more than $$633$$ pieces. Each student can take up to three chocolates, and they may also choose not to take any. If the students are grouped based on the types and quantities of chocolates they take, what is the minimum number of students in the largest group?

从甲城往乙城运$$78$$吨货物，如果用载重量是$$5$$吨的大卡车运一趟，运费: To transport $$78$$ tons of goods from City A to City B, if a large truck with a capacity of $$5$$ tons is used for one trip, the cost is $$110$$ yuan, and if a small truck with a capacity of $$2$$ tons is used for one trip, the cost is $$50$$ yuan. If both large and small trucks can be rented simultaneously, what is the minimum cost for transportation?
赵乡长下村召集甲、乙、丙、丁四个村的村干部会议，这四个村子每相邻两个村子都是相距: Village chief Zhao is gathering a meeting of village officials from villages A, B, C, and D, where each pair of adjacent villages is $$5$$ kilometers apart (as shown in the figure). The number of attendees from each village is as follows: village A has $$8$$ people, village B has $$5$$ people, village C has $$3$$ people, and village D has $$7$$ people. In which village should village chief Zhao hold the meeting to minimize the total distance traveled by all attendees? What is the answer?
有$$100$$个少先队员参加广播操比赛，排成了一个正方形实心方队，问这个正方形: There are $$100$$ Young Pioneers participating in a radio gymnastics competition, arranged in a solid square formation. How many Young Pioneers are standing around the square?
新华小学四年级学生排成一个实心方阵，还多$$9$$人．如果横、竖各增加一排，成为: The fourth-grade students at Xinhua Primary School form a solid square formation, with $$9$$ extra people. If one row is added horizontally and one vertically, forming a larger solid square, there are $$24$$ people short. How many students are there in total in the fourth grade?
在体操表演时，六年级学生排成一个实心方队（横竖行人数相等）．已知最外层为$$72: During the gymnastics performance, the sixth-grade students formed a solid square formation (with an equal number of people in rows and columns). It is known that there are $$72$$ people in the outer layer, how many people are there in total in this formation?
王阿姨要复印$$5$$张文稿，正反面都要复印，如果复印机只能单面复印，且一次最多: Aunt Wang wants to copy $$5$$ pages of documents, and both sides need to be copied. If the copier can only copy one side at a time and can hold a maximum of $$2$$ pages, what is the minimum number of times she needs to make copies to finish?
赵、孙、李三位同学同时到校卫生室治病，孙打针，需要$$5$$分钟；李外科换药，需: Zhao, Sun, and Li arrived at the school clinic at the same time to receive treatment. Sun needs $$5$$ minutes for an injection; Li needs $$3$$ minutes for a bandage change; Zhao needs only $$1$$ minute for eye drops. There is only one doctor, Dr. Zhang, in the clinic. To minimize the total time the three students spend in the clinic, what is the minimum total time they will stay in minutes?
小学三年级有$$120$$名学生，他们排成一个三层的空心方阵，如果在内部再加一层: There are $$120$$ students in the third grade of elementary school. They are arranged in a three-layer hollow square formation. If another layer is added inside, how many more people are needed?
在游艺会上，有$$100$$名同学抽到了标签分别为$$1$$至$$100$$的奖: At the carnival, there are $$100$$ students who received lottery tickets numbered from $$1$$ to $$100$$. The rules for distributing prizes based on the ticket numbers are as follows: (1) For ticket numbers that are multiples of $$2$$, they receive $$2$$ pencils. (2) For ticket numbers that are multiples of $$3$$, they receive $$3$$ pencils. (3) For ticket numbers that are both multiples of $$2$$ and $$3$$, they can receive prizes repeatedly. (4) All other ticket numbers receive $$1$$ pencil. How many pencils in total were prepared for this activity at the carnival?
有编号$$1\\sim 30$$的$$30$$枚硬币正面朝上放在桌子，先将编号为: There are $$30$$ coins numbered from $$1$$ to $$30$$ placed face up on the table. First, flip the coins that are multiples of $$3$$, then flip the coins that are multiples of $$4$$. In the end, how many coins are still face up?
某班学生手中分别拿红、黄、蓝三种颜色的小旗，已知手中有红旗的共有$$34$$人，: In a certain class, students are holding small flags in three colors: red, yellow, and blue. It is known that there are $$34$$ people holding red flags, $$26$$ people holding yellow flags, and $$18$$ people holding blue flags; there are $$9$$ people holding both red and yellow flags, $$4$$ people holding both yellow and blue flags, $$3$$ people holding both red and blue flags; and there is $$1$$ person holding flags of all three colors. How many people are there in total in this class?
某班有同学$$45$$人，其中许多人参加了课外兴趣活动小组，参加音乐兴趣小组的有: In a certain class, there are $$45$$ students, among which many participate in extracurricular interest groups. There are $$22$$ students in the music interest group, $$26$$ students in the art interest group, and $$6$$ students who do not participate in any interest group. How many students participate in both the music and art interest groups?
实验小学以书法和数学思维训练为特色，该校五年级共有$$245$$名同学，其中参加: The Experimental Primary School features calligraphy and mathematical thinking training. There are a total of $$245$$ fifth-grade students in the school, among which the number of students participating in calligraphy training is $$82$$ more than those participating in mathematical thinking training. There are $$44$$ students who participate in both calligraphy and mathematical thinking training, while $$63$$ students did not participate in either training. How many students in the fifth grade at the Experimental Primary School participated in mathematical thinking training?
学校艺术团共有团员$$45$$人，其中有$$22$$名同学会弹钢琴，$$27$$: The school art troupe has a total of $$45$$ members, among which $$22$$ students can play the piano, $$27$$ students can play the violin, and the number of students who can do both is exactly $$3$$ times the number of students who can do neither. What is the minimum number of students who can do at least one of these?
数学兴趣小组中订阅$$A$$种刊物的共有$$35$$人，订阅$$B$$种刊物的共: In the math interest group, there are a total of $$35$$ people who subscribe to publication $$A$$, $$21$$ people who subscribe to publication $$B$$, among which $$14$$ people subscribe to both, and only $$5$$ people do not subscribe to either. How many people are there in the math interest group in total?
$$2006$$盏亮着的电灯，各有一个开关控制，按顺序编号为$$1$$，$$2$: There are $$2006$$ lamps that are lit, each controlled by a switch, numbered in order from $$1$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, …, $$2006$$. Press the switch for the lamp numbered as a multiple of $$2$$; then press the switch for the lamp numbered as a multiple of $$3$$, and finally press the switch for the lamp numbered as a multiple of $$5$$. How many lamps remain lit after pressing the switches?
一根$$180$$厘米长的木棍，从左端开始每隔$$2$$厘米画一个刻度，画后再从: A wooden stick that is $$180$$ centimeters long has a mark drawn every $$2$$ centimeters starting from the left end, then another mark every $$3$$ centimeters from the left end, then every $$5$$ centimeters, and finally every $$7$$ centimeters. If the stick is cut according to these marks, how many small pieces of wood can it be cut into?
When numbering the pages of a book, a total of $$11$$ digits of "$$6$$" were used. How many pages does this book have?
一本书中间的一张被撕掉了，余下的各张页码数之和是$$5027$$，被撕掉的这张纸: A page in the middle of a book was torn out, and the sum of the page numbers of the remaining pages is $$5027$$. What are the two page numbers on the torn page? (Fill in from smallest to largest)
一本词典共$$400$$页，页码中数字“$$0$$”出现了次．: A dictionary has a total of $$400$$ pages. How many times does the digit “$$0$$” appear in the page numbers?
A novel uses a total of $$127$$ digits for its page numbers. How many pages does this book have?
一本书共有$$200$$页，$$1$$~$$200$$页的页码一共用了个数字．: A book has a total of $$200$$ pages. How many digits were used for the page numbers from $$1$$ to $$200$$?
将自然数按从小到大的顺序无间隔地排成一个大数：$$123456789101112: Arrange the natural numbers in ascending order without gaps to form a large number: $$123456789101112\cdots$$. Question: What is the digit at the $$200$$th position from the left?
给一本书编页码，一共用了$$81$$个数字“$$7$$”，请问这本书最少有多少页: A book is numbered with page numbers using a total of $$81$$ instances of the digit "$$7$$". What is the minimum number of pages this book can have? What is the maximum number of pages? ( )
（2）8位选手进行网球单循环赛，规则是每两位选手都要比一场，那么总共要举行场比赛: In a round-robin tennis tournament with 8 players, the rule is that each pair of players must compete in one match. How many matches will be held in total?
In a round-robin tennis tournament, a certain number of players played a total of $$45$$ matches. How many players participated?
参加世界杯足球赛的国家队共有$$32$$个，称为$$32$$强．其中每$$4$$: There are a total of $$32$$ national teams participating in the World Cup, referred to as the "top 32." Each group consists of $$4$$ national teams, and in a round-robin format, each team must and can only play one match against each of the other teams in their group. The top two teams from each group advance to the knockout stage; in the knockout stage, each pair of teams plays one match to determine the winner, leading to the quarter-finals, semi-finals, and ultimately determining the champion (first place), runner-up (second place), third place (third place), and fourth place (fourth place). (In the semi-finals, the two losing teams compete in a third and fourth place match, while the remaining knockout stage losers do not participate further.) With this information, calculate how many matches there are in total in the World Cup football tournament.
班上四名同学进行跳棋比赛，每两名同学都要赛一局．每局胜者得$$2$$分，平局各得: Four students in the class are competing in a checkers tournament, with each pair of students playing one game. The winner of each game gets $$2$$ points, each player in a draw gets $$1$$ point, and the loser gets $$0$$ points. (1) What is the total score of the four students?
甲、乙、丙、丁、戊五个同学比赛，每两名同学都要赛一局．每局胜者得$$2$$分，平: Five students, A, B, C, D, and E, are competing, and each pair of students must play one game. The winner of each game receives $$2$$ points, each player in a draw receives $$1$$ point, and the loser receives $$0$$ points. Given that students A, B, C, and E scored $$8$$ points, $$5$$ points, $$2$$ points, and $$2$$ points respectively, what is the score of student D?
三个数的平均数是$$120$$，加上一个数后，四个数的平均数变为$$150$$，: The average of three numbers is $$120$$. After adding another number, the average of the four numbers becomes $$150$$. What is the number that was added?
已知$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D$$、$$E$$五个自然数的平均数: Given that the average of the five natural numbers $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$ is $$15$$, the average of $$A$$, $$B$$, and $$C$$ is $$13$$, and the average of $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$ is $$17$$, what is the value of $$C$$?
把$$20$$个苹果平均分给明明和他的$$4$$个朋友，平均每人可以分到个苹果．: If $$20$$ apples are evenly distributed among Mingming and his $$4$$ friends, how many apples does each person get on average?
欢欢每天早上从家步行上学，如果每分钟走$$50$$米，则要迟到$$5$$分钟，如: Huan Huan walks to school from home every morning. If she walks at a speed of $$50$$ meters per minute, she will be $$5$$ minutes late. If she walks at a speed of $$70$$ meters per minute, she will arrive at school $$5$$ minutes early. What is the distance from Huan Huan's home to the school in meters?
猴王给小猴子们分桃子．如果每只小猴分$$10$$个桃子，就余下$$100$$个；: The Monkey King distributes peaches to the little monkeys. If each little monkey receives $$10$$ peaches, there are $$100$$ peaches left; if the total number of little monkeys doubles and each still receives $$10$$ peaches, there will be a shortage of $$200$$ peaches. How many peaches did the Monkey King prepare in total?
某校有$$100$$名学生参加数学竞赛，平均分是$$63$$分，其中参赛男同学的: In a certain school, there are $$100$$ students participating in a math competition, with an average score of $$63$$. The average score of the male participants is $$60$$, and the average score of the female participants is $$70$$. How many more male participants are there than female participants in the school?
甲班有$$33$$人，乙班有$$22$$人． 在一次考试中，甲班的平均分是$$8: Class A has $$33$$ students, Class B has $$22$$ students. In an exam, the average score of Class A is $$80$$ points, and the total average score of Class A and Class B is $$82$$ points. What is the average score of Class B?
乐乐老师原计划评选出一等奖$$15$$人，二等奖$$20$$人，现将一等奖中的后: Teacher Lele originally planned to select $$15$$ first prize winners and $$20$$ second prize winners. Now, the last $$5$$ people in the first prize category have been adjusted to the second prize category. As a result, the average score of the first prize winners increased by $$8$$ points, and the average score of the second prize winners increased by $$6$$ points. How many points was the original average score of the first prize winners higher than that of the second prize winners?
四支球队进行单循环比赛，每场胜者得$$3$$分、平局各得$$1$$分、负者得$$: Four teams are competing in a round-robin tournament. Each match awards $$3$$ points to the winner, $$1$$ point to each team in the event of a draw, and $$0$$ points to the loser. It is known that the team in first place has the fewest goal difference among the four teams and that not all matches ended in a draw. What is the score of the first place team? (Goal difference = number of goals scored - number of goals conceded; teams are ranked by goal difference when points are tied.)
六个人参加乒乓球比赛，每两人之间都要比赛一场，胜者得$$2$$分，负者得$$0$: Six people are participating in a table tennis competition, where each pair plays one match. The winner gets $$2$$ points and the loser gets $$0$$ points. According to the results, both the second and fifth places are tied between two people. How many points did the first place get, and how many points did the fourth place get?
$$5$$个选手进行象棋循环赛，每两个人之间都要赛一盘．规定胜一盘得$$2$$分: In a chess round-robin tournament with $$5$$ players, each pair of players competes in one game. It is stipulated that a win earns $$2$$ points, a draw gives each player $$1$$ point, and a loss earns no points. Given that after the matches, $$4$$ players earned a total of $$16$$ points, how many points did the $$5$$th player earn?
在$$NBA$$的季后赛中，$$16$$支队伍进行淘汰赛，但每两支队伍之间都要进: In the NBA playoffs, $$16$$ teams compete in a knockout tournament, and each pair of teams must play a "best of seven" series, where the first team to win four games advances. How many games must be played at a minimum to determine the champion, and what is the maximum number of games that could be played?
甲、乙、丙、丁四个人进行单循环赛，获胜得$$3$$分，战平得$$1$$分，失败得: In a single round-robin tournament, four people A, B, C, and D compete. A win earns $$3$$ points, a draw earns $$1$$ point, and a loss earns $$0$$ points. It is known that A, B, and C scored $$7$$, $$3$$, and $$2$$ points respectively, and B did not have any draws. How many points did D score?
四个足球队进行单循环比赛，规定胜一场得$$3$$分，平一场得$$1$$分，负一场: Four football teams are playing in a round-robin tournament. It is stipulated that a win earns $$3$$ points, a draw earns $$1$$ point, and a loss earns $$0$$ points. One team has not lost any matches but is ranked last, and there are no cases of all draws. Do you think this is possible? If possible, please provide an example; if not, please explain the reason.
$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D$$、$$E$$五个队进行单循环赛，胜: Five teams $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, $$D$$, and $$E$$ participated in a single round-robin tournament. A win earns $$3$$ points, a loss earns $$0$$ points, and a draw earns each team $$1$$ point. After the matches, it was found that team $$A$$ had $$2$$ wins and $$2$$ losses, team $$B$$ had $$8$$ points, team $$C$$ had $$9$$ points, and $$E$$ won against $$D$$. What points did team $$D$$ earn, and what points did team $$E$$ earn?
有$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D$$四支足球队进行单循环比赛，规定：: There are four soccer teams: $$A$$, $$B$$, $$C$$, and $$D$$, competing in a round-robin tournament. The rules are: winning a match earns $$2$$ points, a draw earns $$1$$ point, and losing earns $$0$$ points. After all matches are finished, teams $$A$$ and $$B$$ are tied for first place, team $$C$$ is in second place, and team $$D$$ is in third place. What is the maximum score that team $$C$$ can achieve?
羽毛球一直是我国的优势项目，在一次国际赛事上，我国著名选手鲍春来$$2:1$$逆: Badminton has always been a strong event in our country. In an international competition, our famous player Bao Chunlai reversed the match with Indonesian player Taufik with a score of $$2:1$$ (badminton is played to $$21$$ points). After calculation, both players scored a total of $$59$$ points over three games, and the point difference in each game did not exceed $$4$$ points (when a player scores $$21$$ points or more, winning by $$2$$ points is required). What were the scores in the three games (with Bao Chunlai's scores listed first)?
甲、乙、丙、丁四人进行乒乓球单循环赛，结果有三人获胜的场数相同（无平局）．另一个: In a round-robin table tennis tournament among four people, A, B, C, and D, three of them have the same number of wins (no ties). How many matches did the other person win?
非零自然数的平方按从小到大排成一行：$$14916253649\\cdots \: The squares of non-zero natural numbers are arranged in order from smallest to largest: $$14916253649\cdots \cdots$$. What is the digit in the $$100$$th position from the left?
给一本书编页码时，一共用了$$24$$个数字“$$8$$”且最后一页是含有“$$: When numbering the pages of a book, a total of $$24$$ digits "$$8$$" were used, and the last page has a page number that contains "$$8$$". How many pages does this book have?
一本词典共$$1755$$页，页码中数字$$0$$出现了次．: A dictionary has a total of $$1755$$ pages, how many times does the digit $$0$$ appear in the page numbers?
毛毛有一本书，中间被豆豆撕掉了一张纸（含两个相邻页码）．毛毛将残书的所有页码相加: Mao Mao has a book, and a page (including two adjacent page numbers) was torn out by Dou Dou. Mao Mao added up all the remaining page numbers and got $$777$$. How many pages did Mao Mao's book originally have?
排一本学生字典的页码用了$$2925$$个数字，这本字典共有页．: The student dictionary used $$2925$$ digits for the page numbers. How many pages does this dictionary have?
一本书中间的一张被撕掉了，余下的各张页码数之和是$$1133$$，被撕掉的这张纸: A page in the middle of a book was torn out, and the sum of the page numbers of the remaining pages is $$1133$$. What are the two page numbers on the torn page?

哥哥对弟弟说：“当我像你这么大时，你才$$5$$岁．”弟弟对哥哥说：“当我像你这: The brother said to the younger brother: "When I was your age, you were only $$5$$ years old." The younger brother replied: "When I am your age, you will be $$35$$ years old." How old is the younger brother this year?

货场原有煤若干吨．第一次运出原有煤的一半，第二次运进$$450$$吨，第三次又运: The warehouse originally had a certain number of tons of coal. In the first transport, half of the original coal was taken out. In the second transport, $$450$$ tons were brought in. In the third transport, half of the current coal was taken out again, plus $$50$$ tons. As a result, twice the remaining coal is $$1200$$ tons. How many tons of coal did the warehouse originally have?
$$A$$、$$B$$、$$C$$、$$D$$四个人共有$$64$$块砖块，$$: A, B, C, and D have a total of $$64$$ bricks. A gives some bricks to B and C, so that their number of bricks doubles; then B gives some bricks to C and D, causing their number of bricks to double; C also gives some bricks to D and A, making their number of bricks double; finally, D gives some bricks to A and B, so that their number of bricks also doubles, and at this point, the number of bricks they each have is equal. How many bricks did A originally have, how many bricks did B originally have, how many bricks did C originally have, and how many bricks did D originally have?
牛老师带着$$37$$名同学到野外春游．休息时，艾迪问：“牛老师您今年多少岁啦?: Teacher Niu took $$37$$ students on a spring outing. During the break, Eddie asked, “Teacher Niu, how old are you this year?” Teacher Niu amusingly replied, “If you multiply my age by $$2$$, subtract $$16$$, then divide by $$2$$, and add $$8$$, the result is exactly the total number of people participating in today’s activity.” How old is Teacher Niu this year?
在一根绳子上依次穿$$7$$颗白珠、$$4$$颗黑珠，并按此方式重复．如果从头开: On a string, there are $$7$$ white beads and $$4$$ black beads threaded in that order, and this pattern is repeated. If a total of $$120$$ beads have been threaded from the beginning, how many more white beads are there than black beads among these $$120$$ beads?
我国$$1997$$年$$7$$月$$1$$日收回对香港的主权，这天正好是星期二: On July 1, 1997, our country regained sovereignty over Hong Kong, and that day was exactly Tuesday. What day of the week will it be on July 1, 2019, for the 22nd anniversary celebration?
$$2018$$年的$$11$$月$$1$$日是星期四，那么这一年的$$12$$: If November 1, 2018 is a Thursday, what day of the week is December 31 of that year?
$$\\underbrace{2\\times 2\\times \\cdots: What is the unit digit of the result of $$\underbrace{2\times 2\times \cdots \times 2}_{20 \text{ twos}} - 1$$?
鸡兔同笼，共$$3$$只头，共$$10$$条腿，问：有只鸡？: In a cage, there are a total of $$3$$ heads and $$10$$ legs. How many chickens are there?
$$12$$个同学围成一圈做传手绢的游戏，如图．从$$1$$号同学开始，逆时针传: In a circle, $$12$$ students are playing the handkerchief passing game, as shown in the figure. Starting from student $$1$$, if the handkerchief is passed $$200$$ times counterclockwise, which student's hands should the handkerchief be in?
$$2016$$年的$$6$$月$$1$$日是星期三，则$$2013$$年的$$: If June 1, 2016 is a Wednesday, then what day of the week is June 1, 2013?
小童的生日是$$6$$月$$27$$日，这一年的$$6$$月$$1$$日是星期六: Xiao Tong's birthday is June 27. June 1 of this year is a Saturday. What day of the week is Xiao Tong's birthday?
乐乐百货商店委托搬运站运送$$100$$只花瓶．双方商定每只运费$$10$$元，: Lele Department Store entrusted a transportation station to deliver $$100$$ vases. Both parties agreed on a shipping fee of $$10$$ per vase, but if any are damaged, not only is there no shipping fee for each broken one, but they also have to compensate $$10$$ for each one broken. As a result, the transportation station received a total shipping fee of $$920$$. How many vases were broken during the transportation process?
鸡兔原来共有$$62$$条腿，现把鸡和兔互换，所有的鸡变成兔子，所有的兔子变成鸡: Originally, there were $$62$$ legs in total between chickens and rabbits. Now, if all the chickens become rabbits and all the rabbits become chickens, there are now $$88$$ legs in total. How many chickens were there originally?
商店营业员去银行兑换零钱，用$$80$$张一百元的人民币兑换了二十元和五十元的人: The store clerk went to the bank to exchange coins, using $$80$$ one-hundred-yuan bills to exchange for a total of $$220$$ twenty-yuan and fifty-yuan bills, how many twenty-yuan bills are there?
一次数学考试只有$$10$$道题，做对一题得$$10$$分，做错一题或不做倒扣$: In a math exam, there are only $$10$$ questions. If you answer a question correctly, you get $$10$$ points; if you answer incorrectly or leave it blank, you lose $$3$$ points. Wei Er did not pass this time, but she found that if she had one fewer mistake, she would score $$61$$ points. How many questions did she answer correctly?

在纸上画$$14$$条直线，最多可有个交点．: If you draw $$14$$ straight lines on paper, what is the maximum number of intersection points that can be formed?

已知平行四边形$$ABCD$$的面积是$$60$$平方厘米，$$CD=10$$厘: Given that the area of parallelogram $$ABCD$$ is $$60$$ square centimeters, and $$CD = 10$$ centimeters, what is the length of $$AE$$ in centimeters?
如图，梯形的面积是．\n question_4461-image_0: What is the area of the trapezoid as shown in the figure?

$$1$$, $$2$$, $$4$$, $$7$$, $$8$$, $$10$$, $$13$$, $$14$$, $$16$$, $$19$$, …, $$100$$
桌子上有$$7$$个开口向上的杯子，现在允许每次同时翻动其中的$$4$$个，问能: Can all $$7$$ cups have their openings facing down after several flips if it is allowed to flip $$4$$ cups at a time?
如图，甲、乙、丙三个大小相同的杯子在桌面上依次排列，其中甲杯中盛满水，乙和丙是空: In the figure, three cups A, B, and C of the same size are arranged in order on the table. Cup A is full of water, while cups B and C are empty. If all the water is poured into an adjacent (left or right) empty cup, after $$55$$ pours, which cup has water?
小猴子出门关好了灯，晚上小猴子回到家准备开灯，他一共按了$$12$$下开关，灯还: The little monkey turned off the lights before going out. When he returned home at night and prepared to turn on the lights, he pressed the switch a total of $$12$$ times, but the light still didn't turn on. It turned out that there was a power outage. Can you guess what the light will be like when the power comes back on?
如下图所示，两条河流的交汇处有两个岛，有七座桥连接这两个岛及河岸．问：一个散步者: As shown in the figure, there are two islands at the intersection of two rivers, and there are seven bridges connecting these two islands and the riverbanks. The question is: Can a walker traverse all seven bridges without repeating any?
下图中的每条线都表示一条街道，线上的数字表示这条街道的千米数．邮车从邮局出发，要: In the figure below, each line represents a street, and the numbers on the lines indicate the kilometers of that street. The postal truck starts from the post office, needs to travel all the streets, and finally return to the post office. What is the shortest distance the postal truck will travel in kilometers?
李奶奶在街心花园的小路上散步（如下图），她能不能一次不重复地走遍所有的路后回到出: Can Grandma Li walk through all the paths in the street garden without repeating any and return to the starting point? If not, what route should she take to make the total distance the shortest? What is the shortest distance?
下图中有$$6$$个点，$$8$$条线段，一只小甲虫从$$A$$点出发，要沿着某: In the figure below, there are $$6$$ points and $$8$$ line segments. A little beetle starts from point $$A$$ and must crawl to point $$F$$ along certain line segments. During its journey, the beetle can only move to the right, downward, or diagonally down to the right. How many different ways can the beetle walk?
将$$12$$块糖分成数量不同的$$3$$堆，每堆至少一个，共有________: If you divide $$12$$ candies into $$3$$ piles with different quantities, with at least one in each pile, how many different ways can this be done?
有五种价格分别为$$2$$元、$$5$$元、$$8$$元、$$11$$元、$$1: There are five types of gifts priced at $$2$$ yuan, $$5$$ yuan, $$8$$ yuan, $$11$$ yuan, and $$14$$ yuan, and five types of packaging boxes priced at $$3$$ yuan, $$5$$ yuan, $$7$$ yuan, $$9$$ yuan, and $$11$$ yuan. If one gift is paired with one packaging box, how many different total prices are there?
下图中有$$6$$个点，$$8$$条线段．一只甲虫从$$A$$点出发，要沿着某几: In the figure below, there are $$6$$ points and $$8$$ line segments. A beetle starts from point $$A$$ and must crawl along certain line segments to reach point $$F$$ (it stops moving upon reaching point $$F$$). During its journey, it can pass through the same point or line segment at most $$1$$ time. How many different ways can the beetle reach point $$F$$?
将$$12$$个相同的小球分成$$3$$堆，共有种不同的分法．: How many different ways are there to divide $$12$$ identical balls into $$3$$ piles?
如图，一只蚂蚁要从一个正四面体的顶点$$A$$出发，沿着这个正四面体的棱依次不重: As shown in the figure, an ant starts from a vertex $$A$$ of a regular tetrahedron and must walk along the edges to visit all $$4$$ vertices without repeating any, then return to vertex $$A$$. How many different paths does the ant have?
现有$$1\\sim 12$$共十二个自然数，把$$26$$分拆成其中三个不同自: There are a total of twelve natural numbers from $$1$$ to $$12$$. How many different ways can $$26$$ be split into three different natural numbers among them?
$$15$$块相同的糖分成数量不同的$$3$$堆，共有种不同的分法．: There are $$15$$ identical candies divided into $$3$$ piles of different quantities. How many different ways are there to divide them?
把$$25$$分拆成$$7$$个不同自然数的和，这样的分拆方式一共有种？将不同的: How many ways can you split $$25$$ into the sum of $$7$$ different natural numbers? Please list the different representations.
将$$7$$拆成若干个（两个及以上）非零自然数之和，共有种情况．: How many ways can you express $$7$$ as a sum of several (two or more) non-zero natural numbers?
袋中有$$3$$个相同的红球，$$4$$个相同的黄球和$$5$$个相同的白球，小: There are $$3$$ identical red balls, $$4$$ identical yellow balls, and $$5$$ identical white balls in the bag. If Xiao Ming randomly takes out $$6$$ balls, how many different possibilities are there for him to take out the balls?
把$$8$$把相同的尺子分给$$3$$个小朋友，每个小朋友至少分一把，有种不同的: If $$8$$ identical rulers are distributed to $$3$$ children, with each child receiving at least one ruler, how many different distributions are there?
甲、乙两人打乒乓球，连赢头两局的人获胜；如果没有人连赢头两局，则先赢三局的人获胜: In a table tennis match between A and B, the person who wins the first two games in a row is the winner; if no one wins the first two games in a row, then the person who wins three games first is the winner. How many possible outcomes are there from the start of the match until a winner is decided?
一个四位数，如果在百位和十位之间用逗号隔开，那么可以将这个四位数写成两个两位数$: A four-digit number, if separated by a comma between the hundred and ten places, can be written as two two-digit numbers $$(3162 \to 31,62)$$. If the two two-digit numbers have an integer multiple relationship, we call such a four-digit number a "clever number." Please select $$4$$ numbers from $$1$$, $$2$$, $$4$$, $$6$$, $$8$$ to form a four-digit number. How many "clever numbers" are there?
对于一行数，如果有三个数字$$abc$$依次排一起，且$$a>b$$，$$c>b: For a sequence of numbers, if there are three digits $$abc$$ arranged in order, and either $$a > b$$ and $$c > b$$ or $$a < b$$ and $$c < b$$, we call it a turning point. For example, $$4321$$ has no turning points, $$1243$$ has one turning point, and $$1324$$ has two turning points. How many arrangements of $$1$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, and $$4$$ can be made such that the sequence has exactly two turning points?
有七个盘子，每个盘子中分别装有$$1$$个、$$2$$个、$$3$$个、$$5$: There are seven plates, each containing $$1$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, $$5$$, $$6$$, $$7$$, and $$9$$ pears respectively. If you want to take $$15$$ pears from these plates, and you can either take all the pears from a plate or none at all, how many different ways are there to choose?
如图，图中有些数已经填好．其余每个格子中的数等于同一横行最左面数与同一竖列最上面: In the figure, some numbers are already filled in. The number in each remaining box equals the product of the leftmost number in the same row and the topmost number in the same column (for example, $$a=8\times 11=88$$). What is the sum of all the numbers filled in the empty boxes?
今年父亲的岁数是儿子岁数的$$6$$倍，$$15$$年后，父亲的岁数是儿子的$$: This year, the father's age is $$6$$ times the son's age. In $$15$$ years, the father's age will be $$3$$ times the son's age. What is the son's age this year?
小英比小明小$$2$$岁，今年他们的年龄和等于老师年龄的一半，再过$$16$$年: Xiao Ying is $$2$$ years younger than Xiao Ming. This year, their ages sum up to half of the teacher's age. In $$16$$ years, their ages will sum up to the teacher's age. How old is Xiao Ying this year?
一个边长$$10$$厘米的正方形，被横着切了$$3$$刀，竖着切了$$3$$刀，: A square with a side length of $$10$$ centimeters is cut horizontally $$3$$ times and vertically $$3$$ times, resulting in $$16$$ small rectangles. What is the total perimeter of these $$16$$ small rectangles in centimeters?
已知一个长方形的长是$$15$$，宽是$$9$$，长边剪$$2$$刀，宽边剪$$: Given a rectangle with a length of $$15$$ and a width of $$9$$, if the long side is cut $$2$$ times and the short side is cut $$1$$ time, what is the total perimeter of $$6$$ small rectangles?
一个大长方形被分成了$$16$$个小长方形，其中$$4$$块周长已经标出，则大长: A large rectangle is divided into $$16$$ smaller rectangles, and the perimeter of $$4$$ of them is already marked. What is the perimeter of the large rectangle in centimeters?
用剪刀在一个周长为$$36$$厘米长方形纸片上横竖各剪$$2$$刀，则新产生的$: If you use scissors to cut a rectangular piece of paper with a perimeter of $$36$$ centimeters, making $$2$$ cuts vertically and $$2$$ cuts horizontally, what is the sum of the perimeters of the $$9$$ new rectangles in centimeters?
一块菜地，形状如图所示，已知$$a=b=30$$米，$$c=12$$米，这块地的: A vegetable plot, shaped as shown in the figure, has $$a = b = 30$$ meters and $$c = 12$$ meters. What is the perimeter of this plot in meters?
把$$12$$棵树排为$$6$$行，保证每行有$$4$$棵，能否做到？: Can $$12$$ trees be arranged in $$6$$ rows with $$4$$ trees in each row?
在下图中添加一条直线，那么图中的交点数不可能变成（ ）个．\n question: What is the number of intersection points that cannot occur if a straight line is added to the figure below?
图中的$$5$$个点一共可以画出$$6$$条直线，如果在图中再增加一个点，新产生: The $$5$$ points in the figure can form $$6$$ lines. If we add one more point to the figure, how many possible scenarios are there for forming new lines?
在同一平面上任给$$9$$个点，最多可以确定条直线．: In the same plane, how many straight lines can be determined by any given $$9$$ points at most?
How many regions can $$13$$ straight lines at most divide the plane into?
在同一平面上任给$$20$$个点，最多可以确定条直线．同一平面上的$$20$$: Given $$20$$ points in the same plane, what is the maximum number of lines that can be determined? How many intersection points can a maximum of $$20$$ lines in the same plane have?
如果在一个平面上画出$$4$$条直线，最多可以把平面分成个部分．如果画$$20$: If $$4$$ straight lines are drawn on a plane, what is the maximum number of regions the plane can be divided into? If $$20$$ straight lines are drawn, what is the maximum number of regions that can be formed?
某车队买回了一些新轮船，小明数了一下，发现要是把每辆车的$$2$$个前胎全部换掉: A certain fleet bought some new tires. Xiao Ming counted and found that if all $$2$$ front tires of each vehicle were replaced, there would still be $$20$$ tires left; if all $$4$$ tires of each vehicle were replaced, there would only be $$6$$ tires left. 商人需要骆驼驮着货物穿过沙漠，如果其中$$2$$只骆驼每只驮$$4$$箱，其余每: A merchant needs camels to carry goods across the desert. If $$2$$ camels carry $$4$$ boxes each, the remaining camels carry $$2$$ boxes each, and there are $$4$$ boxes left; if $$1$$ camel carries $$6$$ boxes and the remaining camels carry $$4$$ boxes each, then $$3$$ camels will have no goods to carry. How many camels are there in total?
国庆节快到了，学而思学校的少先队员去摆花．如果每人摆$$6$$盆花，还有$$3$: The National Day is approaching, and the Young Pioneers of Xueersi School are setting up flowers. How many Young Pioneers participated in the flower arrangement activity, and how many pots of flowers are there in total?
老师给新入学的小朋友分积分卡，每个人分到的一样多．如果每个小朋友分$$10$$张: The teacher gives the new students score cards, and each person gets the same amount. If each student receives $$10$$ cards, there are $$30$$ cards short; if each student receives $$8$$ cards, there are still $$8$$ cards short. How many students are there in total, and how many score cards are there?

If $$3$$ people sit on each bench, there will be $$7$$ people left over. If $$7$$ people sit on each bench, there will be $$3$$ benches extra. How many Young Pioneers are attending the meeting?
李老师买来了一筐橘子，如果全部分给大班的小朋友，每人$$3$$个，将余下$$5$: Teacher Li bought a basket of oranges. If all of them are distributed to the children in the big class, each child receives $$3$$ oranges, leaving $$5$$ oranges remaining. If all of them are distributed to the children in the small class, each child receives $$2$$ oranges, leaving $$8$$ oranges remaining. It is known that there is $$1$$ more child in the small class than in the big class. How many oranges are there in the basket?
实验小学学生乘车去春游，如果每辆车坐$$60$$人，则有$$15$$人上不了车；: If the students of Experimental Elementary School take a bus for the spring outing, and each bus seats $$60$$ people, then $$15$$ people cannot get on the bus; if each bus accommodates $$5$$ more people, there will be exactly one extra bus. How many students are there in total? How many buses are there in total?
小明妈妈带着一笔钱去买肉，若买$$10$$千克牛肉则还差$$6$$元，若买$$1: Xiao Ming's mother took a sum of money to buy meat. If she buys $$10$$ kilograms of beef, she will still be short $$6$$ yuan. If she buys $$12$$ kilograms of pork, she will have $$4$$ yuan left. It is known that beef is $$3$$ yuan more expensive per kilogram than pork. How much money did Xiao Ming's mother bring?
水果店用一批猕猴桃和哈密瓜来搭配水果礼盒．如果每$$5$$个猕猴桃和$$3$$个: The fruit store uses a batch of kiwis and cantaloupes to prepare fruit gift boxes. If every $$5$$ kiwis and $$3$$ cantaloupes are packed into one box, there are $$4$$ kiwis left over and exactly enough cantaloupes. If $$7$$ kiwis and $$3$$ cantaloupes are packed into one box, there are $$12$$ cantaloupes left over and exactly enough kiwis. How many kiwis are there, and how many cantaloupes are there?
3月$$12$$日植树节，三年级一班同学去植树，如果其中$$3$$人各植树$$2: On March $$12$$, Arbor Day, the students of Class One in Grade Three went to plant trees. If $$3$$ of them each plant $$2$$ trees, and the remaining students each plant $$6$$ trees, they will just finish planting all the seedlings. If the number of students is doubled, then each person planting $$2$$ trees will still leave $$8$$ trees unplanted. How many students participated in the tree planting, and how many trees need to be planted in total?
学校组织一批师生去别的城市参加会议，为此提前预定了一些房间．如果每间住$$3$$: The school organized a group of teachers and students to attend a conference in another city and reserved some rooms in advance. If each room accommodates $$3$$ people, then $$20$$ people do not have a place to stay; if each room accommodates $$6$$ people, the remaining $$2$$ people can each have a room. If each room accommodates $$10$$ people, how many rooms can be left empty?
卫生部对$$120$$种食物是否含有维生素$$A$$、$$C$$、$$E$$进行: The Ministry of Health conducted a survey on $$120$$ types of food to see if they contain vitamins $$A$$, $$C$$, and $$E$$. The results are as follows: there are $$62$$ types containing vitamin $$A$$, $$90$$ types containing vitamin $$C$$, and $$68$$ types containing vitamin $$E$$. There are $$48$$ types containing both vitamins $$A$$ and $$C$$, $$36$$ types containing both vitamins $$A$$ and $$E$$, $$50$$ types containing both vitamins $$C$$ and $$E$$, and $$25$$ types containing all three vitamins. How many types of food contain only vitamin $$A$$?
写有$$1$$到$$100$$编号的灯$$100$$盏，亮着排成一排，第一次把编: There are $$100$$ lights numbered from $$1$$ to $$100$$, all initially turned on in a row. In the first round, the lights numbered with multiples of $$3$$ are switched off, and in the second round, the lights numbered with multiples of $$5$$ are switched off. How many lights remain on?
三年级课外活动有体育、音乐、书法三个小组，参加的人数分别是$$54$$人、$$4: In the third grade, there are three extracurricular activity groups: sports, music, and calligraphy, with the number of participants being $$54$$, $$46$$, and $$36$$ respectively. There are $$4$$ people participating in both the sports group and the music group, $$7$$ people in both the sports group and the calligraphy group, and $$10$$ people in both the music group and the calligraphy group. There are $$2$$ people participating in all three groups. How many people are there in total participating in extracurricular activities in the third grade?
甲、乙两桶油共重$$240$$千克，第一次从甲桶里倒出与乙桶同样多的油放入乙桶，: Two barrels of oil, A and B, weigh a total of $$240$$ kilograms. The first time, the same amount of oil is poured from barrel A into barrel B. The second time, the same amount of oil is poured from barrel B back into barrel A. At this point, both barrels contain the same amount of oil.
